channel.title: How do I run PimpScape? PLEASE VIEW!
channel.description:
I'm trying to run PimpScape. I complied it with "Perfect Compiler by Mod Taharok" and clicked on run.bat. I've compiled it, now im trying to run it. The oldest private server (Rsprivservclient) compiles the same way. It says:
Note: Some programs use driver difficulties Note: Re-compile with X-Clint for more details Press any key to continue...
It says that on PimpScape. Thats normal though. The problem is that when i click on run.bat, it just says:
Starting PimpScape on 0.0.0.0::43594
And it stays like that. BlakeScape (the oldest private server) did that, but after about 10 seconds, it loaded a screen.
Please help me---

item.title: How do I run PimpScape? PLEASE VIEW!

@dnsi wrote:

Does it work???
I just said it to my java experence. Im not sure if it works…

item.title: How do I run PimpScape? PLEASE VIEW!
item.dc:creator: @dnsi dnsi
item.description:
@dnsi wrote:

I thought that when the server tells you that the server is running on 0.0.0.0:port means the server is running…
Moparscapoe works with it
DOnt use any compiler Just use
javac -cp *.java

Run is:
java *.class

item.title: How do I run PimpScape? PLEASE VIEW!
item.dc:creator: @X_master_X X master X
item.description:
@X_master_X wrote:

You mean to go in Mopar, run it and use my local IP? Should I put mopar into the PS folder??[br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2006, 01:01:14 PM[/size][hr]WTF? i just got 83 errors…how do i fix?

item.title: How do I run PimpScape? PLEASE VIEW!
item.dc:creator: @Fallen_Ash Fallen Ash
item.description:
@Fallen_Ash wrote:

On PimpScape, it says that until the server actually needs to do something. (e.g. someone logs in, uses a command etc).

Try and log in on 127.0.0.1 in Mopar. It should say that you did in Run

Read full topic
